pageContext.title: Numeric Separators For Large Integers in Javascript
pageContext.content:
![numeric_sep.png](https://media.graphcms.com/WzpGqMapTwWFUzFKfx8A#noshadow)

I never knew that you could use underscores to essentially make large numbers more readable. The example above is clearly contrived, but there are many situations where separating numbers would be very helpful when reading integers.

This one is def going in the toolbox because it's fun.
